about_page.title: About Us
about_page.mission_text: At the heart of the Yu-Gi-Oh! community, STAFF® was born from a passion for strategic dueling and a vision to create a space where players of all levels could connect, compete, and grow together. Our mission is to foster a vibrant and inclusive environment, offering innovative tools for deck building, tournament organization, and a platform for sharing news and strategies. We believe every duelist has a story to tell, and we are here to help write them.
about_page.offer_deck_builder_desc: Create, edit and manage your decks with ease, with access to a vast card database and rule validation.
about_page.offer_tournaments_desc: Participate in or organize tournaments with full management. Support for exclusive formats like
about_page.offer_leagues_desc: Compete in leagues representing real teams (with official logos) or defend the honor of your clan.
about_page.offer_rivalries_desc: Compare your head-to-head history against any player on the Rivalry page and track your detailed performance.
about_page.offer_clans_desc: Create clans, manage members and access exclusive performance dashboards for leaders.
about_page.offer_news_desc: Stay up to date with the meta with news brought by our exclusive AI, MetaBot, plus community articles.
about_page.join_us: Join us and be part of STAFF®!

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: Have any questions, suggestions or need support? Our team is ready to help. Click the button below to talk to us directly on WhatsApp.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro_text_1: Welcome to Yugi Forge Arena (hereinafter referred to as "Platform" or "we"). Your privacy is fundamental to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when using our site and services.
privacy_policy.intro_text_2: By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to the terms described in this policy. Our practices are aligned with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13.709/2018).
privacy_policy.data_text: For the proper functioning of the Platform and tournament organization, we collect the following data:
privacy_policy.data_account_desc: Username, email address and avatar (provided via authentication).
privacy_policy.data_third_party_desc: Discord ID and Username (if you link your account for community features).
privacy_policy.data_usage_desc: Created decks, match history, tournament participation and comments.
privacy_policy.data_logs_desc: IP address and browser data for security and abuse monitoring purposes.
privacy_policy.usage_text: We use your information strictly to:
privacy_policy.usage_identity: Manage your identity and access to the Platform.
privacy_policy.usage_tournaments: Organize tournaments, generate pairings and maintain rankings (Hall of Fame).
privacy_policy.usage_interaction: Allow interaction with other users (comments, clan creation).
privacy_policy.usage_communication: Communicate important updates about the platform or events you have signed up for.
privacy_policy.usage_security: Prevent fraud, duplicate accounts ("smurfs") and ensure competitive integrity.
privacy_policy.sharing_text: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. Your data may be shared only in the following situations:
privacy_policy.sharing_public_desc: Your username, avatar, decks (if public) and tournament history are visible to other users of the Platform.
privacy_policy.sharing_organizers_desc: Admins of tournaments you sign up for can view your Discord ID for match coordination.
privacy_policy.sharing_legal_desc: When required by law or court order.
privacy_policy.cookies_text: We use essential cookies to keep your login session active (via Supabase Auth). We do not use third-party advertising tracking cookies without your explicit consent.
privacy_policy.rights_confirm: Confirm the existence of data processing.
privacy_policy.rights_correct: Correct incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data (via Profile page).
privacy_policy.rights_delete: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal retention or for integrity of past tournament records).
privacy_policy.rights_contact: To exercise your rights, contact us via our Discord or contact form.
privacy_policy.changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via notices on the Platform or via email.
